name: World Orthopedics Conference
content: Lambda Research Group invites all participants by presenting the latest Scientific Improvement and technologies in the field of Orthopedics. WOC 2024 welcomes all the eminent researchers and scholars around the globe to be part of the most awaited event of “World Orthopedics Conference” held on July 15-16, 2024 at London, UK. Our congress promises to be an exciting event, bringing together leading experts in the field of orthopedics from around the world. With a diverse range of topics and presentations, attendees can expect to gain valuable insights into the latest research and developments in this dynamic field.
